branchCategory.name: NC(D)G, Double Acting Single Rod, Environmental Option
branchCategory.description: The NCG series is an extremely durable, repairable round body cylinder that provides precision mounting, short overall length, light weight and high speed. The XC6 option can be used in applications where corrosion is a problem.
